for_sales.sales_text:
Half decked, clinker sailing dinghy, 14’6" long, built in Worthing in 1908 by Billet of Seldon Lane, "Trixie" is a gunter rigged cutter with a steel dagger board weighing 47lbs. Her large, steel, pivoted rudder blade is on a wooden rudder stock. 

Sale price includes two topmasts, three booms, two bowsprits and various sails, an Indespension trailer, recently fitted with new hubs and mast support. NB: this boat requires constant maintenance.

Lying ashore near Romsey, Hampshire.

boat.full_description: 'Trixie' is a half decked, clinker sailing dinghy, 14’6” long. She was built in Worthing in 1908 by Billet of Selden Lane. She is a gunter rigged cutter with a steel dagger board weighing 47lbs and a large, steel, pivoted rudder blade on a wooden rudder stock.
boat.name: Trixie
boat.short_description: 'Trixie' is a half-decked clinker sailing dinghy.
